about_the_game:
Email：563883946@qq.com

Welcome to the world of card life. In this world, you can stack cards to synthesize better cards, obtain better attributes, and achieve better outcomes.

For example, dragging the "Inspiration" card to the top of the "Tears" will generate a "Counting" card, which can help you gain more attributes!

Characteristics

🃏 300+collectible cards

💡 100+synthesizable formulas

✅ 50+playable activities

📦 20+different purchasable card packs

🕒 7-9 hours of game time

Collect Cards

There will be over 300 collectible cards in the game, which can be combined with each other or sold to earn coins, and new cards or card packs can be purchased in the store.

Developing a life with multiple endings

You will use dice to advance your life and improve your attributes to achieve different outcomes.

Rich NPCs

The game contains a variety of NPCs that accompany your growth and playable romantic NPCs, and the rich character background is sure to bring you a different experience.

Combat and items

You can fight against monsters in another world, equip cards to enhance attributes, consume cards to restore status, and also recover different monsters to assist in battles.

Holiday games

There will be unique mechanism mini games for you to experience during festivals and holidays.

short_description: A life simulation card game with multiple endings. In the game, players can obtain higher level cards to enhance their character attributes by stacking cards. You can get into the ideal university and realize your ideal, or rewrite the fate of the whole world in the other world.
